## GridTools.GridSelector variable

GridSelector component for switching between multiple grid configurations.

Provides different presentation modes for selecting which grid to display, supporting tabs, cards, accordion, and dropdown interfaces. Enables users to quickly switch between different views of their resource data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
GridSelector: React.FC<IGridSelectorProps>
```

## Example


```tsx
<GridSelector
  gridConfigurations={[
    { id: 'users', title: 'User Data', ... },
    { id: 'products', title: 'Product Catalog', ... }
  ]}
  activeGridId="users"
  presentation="tabs"
  onGridChange={setActiveGridId}
/>
```
